backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access control, user profile storage, and many crypto analytics types with basic profile CRUD guarded by authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files.
frontend/ANDROID_APK_BUILD_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to package the web dashboard as a native Android APK using Capacitor.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining theme variables for light/dark modes with OKLCH colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint defining PWA metadata, icons, splash screens, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining name, icons, theme colors, screenshots, and display settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling module switching, standalone order-flow mode, layout, and React Query setup.
frontend/src/components/BinanceCredentia: UI panel for managing Binance API credentials with save, remove, and connection‑test actions.
Displays confluence zones from backend or generates synthetic ones from Binance data, handling loading, errors, and live status indicators.
frontend/src/components/FlowVisualizatio: Renders capital flow data with synthetic fallback generation and produces an interpretation summary based on flow intensity.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer showing attribution, real‑time status indicator, and branding.
frontend/src/components/FuturesDashboard: Futures dashboard that checks Binance credentials, fetches open positions, handles errors, and displays balances and positions.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with live connection status, navigation buttons, and branding for switching between modules.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/components/OpenPositionsTab: Displays normalized futures positions with risk alerts, formatted metrics, and insights.
frontend/src/components/OrderFlowErrorBo: React error boundary that catches order-flow monitor failures and shows a fallback UI with retry and reload options.
frontend/src/components/OrderFlowMonitor: Main order‑flow monitoring component handling real‑time data, thresholds, alerts, confluence logic, settings, and polling control.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Profile setup modal allowing users to submit name and email using a save‑profile mutation with validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: PWA installation prompt that detects platform, handles native install events, fallback timers, and dismissal persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinanceData.ts: Hook providing live Binance market data via WebSocket with REST fallback, caching updates, and connection status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinanceFuturesMoni: Provides React Query hooks for managing Binance credential storage, testing connections, and fetching/saving user profiles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinanceOrderFlow.t: Implements a polling hook that fetches public Binance order flow data (ticker, trades, book) without requiring credentials.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpenFuturesPositio: Fetches open Binance futures positions from the backend when authenticated and credentials exist, with optional polling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAUpdateToast.ts: Checks for PWA updates and shows a toast prompting the user to update when a new version is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data-fetching hooks that query backend flows, zones, and assets, enriching them with live Binance market data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, utilities, animations, and styling for terminal-like UI components.
frontend/src/lib/binanceDomains.ts: Defines base URLs for Binance public REST and WebSocket endpoints used for market data.
frontend/src/lib/binanceOrderFlowRest.ts: Provides REST helpers to fetch Binance public market data including 24h ticker, recent trades, and book ticker with basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/binanceService.ts: Implements public Binance market data access including REST fallbacks, price fetching, symbol whitelisting, and WebSocket streaming (partially shown).
frontend/src/lib/bookConfluence.ts: Calculates spread metrics, book direction, and detects confluence events combining order flow imbalance with order book movements.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility functions for number, currency, percentage, compact number formatting, and rounding using Portuguese locale rules.
frontend/src/lib/futuresPositionFormat.t: Formats futures position fields such as price, size, leverage, PnL, liquidation price, and returns color/style helpers.
frontend/src/lib/orderFlowAlerts.ts: Generates alerts for proxy liquidations, volume spikes, price spikes, and spread anomalies based on rolling order flow statistics.
frontend/src/lib/orderFlowAnalysis.ts: Provides utilities to classify trades, compute notional values, generate rolling window stats, and detect clusters of large trades.
frontend/src/lib/positionInsights.ts: Generates trading position insights based on PnL, liquidation risk, entry distance, and volatility, with helpers for icons and colors.
frontend/src/lib/projections.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/pwaUtils.ts: Implements PWA-related helpers including install prompts, environment checks, device detection, and display mode utilities.
frontend/src/lib/symbols.ts: Contains whitelisted trading symbols and a helper to normalize and compare ticker formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/service-worker.ts: Defines a service worker handling asset precaching, cache cleanup, and adaptive caching strategies for APIs and static assets.
frontend/src/surfaces/FuturesMonitorTabS: Standalone UI surface rendering the order flow monitor with a minimal header, auth controls, and footer.
frontend/src/utils/safeJson.ts: Provides safe JSON parsing and validation utilities for user settings, including thresholds for order flow, confluence, and alerts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters and flags, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, safelisted neon classes, and extended theme colors and settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, issues, and feature requests related to fixing API integration and UI stability problems.
